usage.cn: 为何好女孩总喜欢坏男孩？
usage.eng: Why do the good girls, always want the bad boys?

usage.cn: 一个女人一辈子总得喜欢上一两个坏男人，才能学会对疼爱自己的男人心存感激。
usage.eng: A woman has got to love a bad man once or twice in her life to be thankful for a good one!

usage.cn: 忧虑并不能阻止不好的事情发生，它只能阻止你享受生活中的美好！
usage.eng: Worrying never stops the bad stuff from happening. It just keeps you from enjoying the good.

usage.cn: 有时候，你要表现自己不好的一面，才能找出谁能接受你最差的你。
usage.eng: Sometimes you have to show your bad side so that you can sort out who can accept you at your worst.
